name: Space Rewinders
description:
Kill enemies, break the dyson sphere and get into black holes to pass onto the next stage. Just be careful, your time stabilizer is broken. You have to fix it each time you get shot.

Controls: 

-  WASD or arrows to move.

- Space to fix the time stabilizer.

- Mouse to aim and shoot.

Programming, original art and soundtrack by Pedro Salas & Ivo Pfaffen

Pedro Salas:  https://itch.io/profile/pedro-salas | Ivo Pfaffen: http://www.ivopfaffen.me
